Posts.Content: May 16, 2019 09:06AM Tinkerbell14 wrote: Hi Heather, I’m sorry you’re having to deal with this. My rib pain (although it scared me) didn’t last long thankfully. Well I should say I still have a little discomfort but the real pain was short lived thankfully. I finished rad treatments about 4 months ago. It’s so frustrating when the docs don’t find a reason for our issues. I hope you’re pain is temporary. Maybe a stress or hairline fracture not visible on X-ray?? Hope it resolves itself and you are feeling better soon. Take good care
